## Q1. Moments of exponential family distributions

Show that the exponential family distributions have moments
\begin{eqnarray*}
  \mathbb{E}Y &=& \mu = b'(\theta) \\
  \operatorname{Var}Y &=& \sigma^2 = b''(\theta) a(\phi).
\end{eqnarray*}
